title: FS: Lot of 12 Low/Mid-Grade T207 Commons **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 12 Low/Mid-Grade T207 Commons **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T207 cards for sale or trade. These are low to mid-grade cards as the scans will show, and most have nice eye appeal for the technical grade. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured (Removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Crandall - $17
Devore - $15
Dooin - $15
H. Lord (Chicago) - $17
Wiltse - $11
Bump for a price drop on the last few remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for another price drop to clear out the last few cards from this group.  Thanks for looking!
